document_data.name: Reghedjic
document_data.mainbody: '''Reghedjic''' was the language spoken by the [[Reghedmen]], [[barbarian]] tribes who inhabited the [[Reghed Glacier]].<ref name=D:SiT-p26>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26}} It was an [[Illuski languages|Illuski language]]<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}} and derived from [[Old Illuskan]].<ref group=note>This is assumed because ''[[Races of Faerûn]]'' states on p. 92 that the Old Illuskans became the Reghedmen.
